messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Teacher Discounts
messages.msgSnippet: ... in our catalog, like the payment methods we are able to accept, apply to all of our customers--individual, educational, institutional, and corporate
messages.messageBody:
>>Because we are a retailer, and not a wholesaler, the discounts listed
in our catalog, like the payment methods we are able to accept, apply
to all of our customers--individual, educational, institutional, and
corporate alike.<<

It looks like they are nicely saying that they have 1 discount, and that
everyone is able to get the same discount. But that is the one that is
already there. No special discounts for anyone :(
Stephanie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Teacher Discounts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/9/00 2:07:15 PM Central Daylight Time, hooperck@alltel.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/9/00 2:07:15 PM Central Daylight Time,
hooperck@... writes:

<< Because we are a retailer, and not a wholesaler, the discounts listed
in our catalog, like the payment methods we are able to accept, apply
to all of our customers--individual, educational, institutional, and
corporate alike. >>

I think they mean that their regular prices are already discounted and they
won't discount them any further for particular groups. Everyone has access
to the same already-discounted prices.


*** KiM ***
runs with scissors
